description:
When using the VC driver the following message is received:

2014-03-12 01:42:32.889 INFO nova.openstack.common.periodic_task [-] Skipping periodic task _periodic_update_dns because its interval is negative
2014-03-12 01:42:32.940 INFO nova.virt.driver [-] Loading compute driver 'vmwareapi.VMwareVCDriver'
2014-03-12 01:42:32.979 WARNING nova.virt.vmwareapi.driver [-] The VMware ESX driver is now deprecated and will be removed in the Juno release. The VC driver will remain and continue to be supported.
title: VMware: VC drivers reports deprectaion message for ESX driver

comments.content:
When using the VC driver the following message is received:

2014-03-12 01:42:32.889 INFO nova.openstack.common.periodic_task [-] Skipping periodic task _periodic_update_dns because its interval is negative
2014-03-12 01:42:32.940 INFO nova.virt.driver [-] Loading compute driver 'vmwareapi.VMwareVCDriver'
2014-03-12 01:42:32.979 WARNING nova.virt.vmwareapi.driver [-] The VMware ESX driver is now deprecated and will be removed in the Juno release. The VC driver will remain and continue to be supported.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content:

Branch:    master

commit 878a82bf547464f934b1b49896886e3abd8f6387
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Mar 12 01:44:44 2014 -0700

    VMware: ensure that deprecation does not appear for VC driver
    
    Commit d041b95b8977e77a51e6031c38f0011b44d3266a added the
    deprecation warning for the ESX driver. This warning should
    not appear for the VC driver.
    
    Change-Id: Ide7b47afbd9e7e4c66a4cdc621fbf511b9c3c953
    Closes-bug: #1291238
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
